fields.name: Ali Shafique
fields.bio: 15+ years of Canadian IT industry experience with deep Salesforce ecosystem expertise. AI Strategy & Marketing Coach and spiritual guide for purpose-driven entrepreneurs. Integrates strategic clarity with learning design, having worked with business and technical teams across top Canadian and US companies.

fields.name: Hooria Amiri
fields.bio: Skilled video editor and content creator specializing in creating engaging visual content that aligns with brand messaging and strategic goals.

fields.name: Ali Hayyan
fields.bio: Expert in content strategy and SEO optimization, focused on creating compelling content that drives organic growth and engagement.

fields.name: The Ghana
fields.bio: Digital strategist specializing in social media management and comprehensive digital marketing strategies for business growth.

fields.title: Digital Strategy & Consulting
fields.description: Comprehensive digital strategy development that connects business goals with smart, technology-enabled execution. We provide strategic planning, technology assessment, and AI integration strategy tailored to your unique business needs.
fields.short_description: Strategic planning and technology assessment for sustainable digital growth

fields.title: Website & Funnel Design
fields.description: User experience design, responsive development, and conversion optimization. We create sales funnel systems with lead capture, automation setup, and continuous optimization based on data and user behavior.
fields.short_description: Responsive websites and optimized sales funnels for maximum conversions

fields.title: Social Media Management
fields.description: Comprehensive social media strategy development, content creation, and community management. We handle platform selection, content planning, audience targeting, and engagement to build lasting relationships with your customers.
fields.short_description: Strategic social media management and content creation

fields.title: Salesforce + CRM Optimization
fields.description: Expert Salesforce configuration, customization, and optimization. We handle system setup, process optimization through workflow automation, lead scoring, pipeline management, and comprehensive training and support.
fields.short_description: Expert Salesforce setup, optimization, and automation

fields.title: Marketing Automation
fields.description: Email marketing campaigns, automation sequences, and lead nurturing systems. We create drip campaigns, lead scoring, qualification processes, and Pardot integration for comprehensive marketing automation.
fields.short_description: Email marketing automation and lead nurturing systems

fields.title: Content Creation & Video Editing
fields.description: Professional content strategy, video production, and graphic design. We handle editorial calendars, topic research, SEO optimization, concept development, filming, editing, and post-production for compelling visual content.
fields.short_description: Professional video production and content creation services

fields.title: SEO & Paid Advertising
fields.description: Comprehensive SEO optimization and PPC management. We provide keyword research, on-page optimization, link building, campaign setup, ad creation, bid management, and detailed analytics with ROI analysis.
fields.short_description: SEO optimization and PPC campaign management

fields.title: AI-Driven Campaign Optimization
fields.description: Strategic AI integration for campaign optimization using tools like ChatGPT, Jasper, and advanced analytics. We set up automation workflows, performance optimization, AI-powered insights, and predictive analytics for measurable business benefits.
fields.short_description: AI integration and automation for campaign optimization
